Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Madison
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, Washington, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, Washington, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Madison. 

Allow extra travel time.
